modName: Kera Companion Follower UNPB Smart Ai
summary:
Update has all the facegen Textures and Meshes Sorry about that

Female Companion follower she can be found in Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn Read description for more info. Endorse if you like
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://s1144.photobucket.com/user/magicomg2299/media/Untitled_zps87658d18.png.html][img]http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o498/magicomg2299/Untitled_zps87658d18.png[/img][/url]

YOU MAY NEED TERA ARMOR SET
Changelog

. Updated the Meshes for her face gen is there now.
. What i mean by Ai now bare with me here this is still a work in progress,
she will adapt to certain situations like such as if shes fighting a (Troll) she would use fire. If she know her chances are not a win she will let you finish the fight
. I want a Custom voice for her and i'm look to hire someone =Credit would be gave and theres money involved.

she can be found in Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn

Don't forget to add your pics :)

Just the replacers or whatever you want

Thanks

To All of the mod authors above i do not own nor take, credit for there wonderful work just without them this mod will not be possible.

Bethesda For skyrim and the creation kit

And thanks to you for trying and downloading my mod

Installation

1 Simply use the Nexus Mod Manager

2 Extract all the files to your skyrim data folder

Uninstall

1 uncheck the mod in NMM

2 Delete all the files that came with this mod.

she can be found in Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn
